amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Justice Assistance Grant program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in the Congressional Record which seeks to increase funding for the Justice Assistance Program by $10 million. Amendment seeks to reduce funding for the Legal Services Corporation by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 316 (Roll no. 249).
